Name: Motioning Monument
About the game: This game that need a little imagination, exploring the abstract landscape and aim of revive the mysterious monument. To revive the monument, Need to build a unique motion. The Object with motion fragment are hidden in landscape. Collect and place them in the right place on the stone board to revive the monument. Walking a bit can be a hassle, but there isn't much to do. Enjoy the exploring and letting your imagination run wild! Features Simple UI and operation Full controller support Steam Cloud Addition of new levels(planned) #1 Grass field It is a refreshing the grass fields with the wind. Find the pieces hidden in the grass.
